hero.title: Automate your processes, boost your business
hero.subtitle: We transform your manual and repetitive tasks into agile and efficient automated systems, freeing up your team to focus on what really matters: growing.

services.title: Our Automation Solutions
services.subtitle: We offer a comprehensive suite of automation services designed to streamline your operations and drive growth.

service1.title: Phantom Clock – Frictionless Time-Tracking
service1.description: Your team clocks in, scans, and moves on. You get ready-to-use reports by location, person, or day. No spreadsheets. No questions. Just control.

service2.title: Self-Organizing Folders
service2.description: Documents are automatically sorted by client, date, or type. Plus, they're backed up to the cloud or a drive without anyone lifting a finger. Ideal for companies with a long history... and accumulated chaos.

service3.title: Requests Without Chaos
service3.description: A single, clean, and traceable channel for requesting supplies, support, or transfers. Goodbye to 'I sent you a WhatsApp.' Hello to real reports and traceability.

service1.title: Ninja Capture from WhatsApp & Social Media
service1.description: What your customers type (name, order, address) becomes a clear entry on your digital dashboard. And they get an automated reply. While you keep selling.

service2.title: POS Without Expensive Systems
service2.description: Your phone is now your cash register, your report, your history. Sales are logged instantly. Without paying for expensive software. No complex inventories. Just real control.

service3.title: Sleeping Customer Radar
service3.description: Customers who haven't returned in X days trigger an automatic alert. With options for direct messages, promotions, or reminders. Recapture sales without picking up the phone.

service1.title: Self-Generating Metrics
service1.description: How much did you sell? What moved the most? How much did you earn? Every piece of data, every day, delivered straight to your email or WhatsApp in Excel or PDF. No formulas. No asking anyone.

service2.title: Pre-Built Accounting
service2.description: Upload expenses or sales and get ready-made balance sheets, alerts, and graphs. For partners, accountants, or investors, in a single click. Without any technical effort.

service3.title: Intelligent Weekly Summary
service3.description: Each team logs what they've done → the system builds a visual report. Perfect for presentations, clients, or internal meetings. And yes... it does it by itself.

service1.title: Silent Guardians on Your Computers
service1.description: We check (without installing anything) for apps that shouldn't be there, strange files, or suspicious tasks. You receive automatic alerts. Security without human intervention.

service2.title: Clean Drive, Agile Company
service2.description: Automatic deletion of digital junk: old, duplicate, or unnecessary files. Configured by date, type, or size. More space. Fewer risks. Hands-free.

service3.title: Scripts with Brains
service3.description: Tasks you do every day (renaming, exporting, moving folders) are now done automatically with pre-configured logic. And the best part: no one notices it happened... only that the work is done.
